conclusion: Determine the path the liquid from each container (A, B, C, and D) will take as it flows through the baffles and into which container (E, F, or G) it will ultimately flow.
The green liquid flows from A through the path indicated by the green arrows.
Liquid from A will flow into container E.
The pink liquid flows from B through the path indicated by the pink arrows.
Liquid from B will flow into container F.
The yellow liquid flows from C through the path indicated by the yellow arrows.
Liquid from C will flow into container F.
The blue liquid flows from D through the path indicated by the blue arrows.
Liquid from D will flow into container G.
Container E will receive liquid from A.
Container F will receive liquid from both B and C.
Container G will receive liquid from D.
Final Answer: A flows into E, B flows into F, C flows into F, D flows into G.
